aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.subtitle1: My Passion and what I do
aboutMe.text1: I am a software engineer who loves code, with a strong passion for design. Currently I specialize on web development creating amazing and professional websites, taking care for the user experience and applying good practices on code for a strong quality and scalability.
aboutMe.text2: Always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow professionally and personally.
aboutMe.text3: Do you want to get started with your project and you need my help, or you just want to work with me? Please contact me.
